com.cleo.lexicom.scripts

Interface IncomingFilters


  • public interface IncomingFilters
    Standalone javascript action incoming filters management interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an incoming filter for all in-scope content.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(LexiComIncomingFilter filter)
  throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds an incoming filter for all in-scope content.

        Limitations:
        - If a Custom ILexiComIncoming Class has already been set in System Options, an incoming filter cannot be set from ISessionScript.
        - Only one incoming filter can be added per script. If multiple are added, only the last one added is actually active.
        - If an incoming file is in-scope for multiple filters (within different scripts), all the filters will potentially be invoked one-by-one; however once any filter returns an output stream, the chain ends. The sequence of the chain is random.
        Parameters:
        filter - an incoming filter. The filter is invoked with every solicited or unsolicited incoming file request just before the content stream begins
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • list

        java.lang.String[][] list(boolean allInScope)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        List added javascript incoming filters
        Parameters:
        allInScope - true if all of the in-scope entries should be listed; false if just the entries added by this javascript should be listed
        Returns:
        list of javascript action alias paths
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • remove

        LexiComIncomingFilter remove(java.lang.String[] path)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Remove an added javascript incoming filter
        Parameters:
        path - the alias path of the javascript action to be removed
        Returns:
        the javascript inooming filter removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
